item.title: How to Get Megazord in Fortnite
item.description:
What better way to squish bugs in Fortnite than with the Dino Megazord outfit, an established titan that combines the five Dinozords of Power Rangers: Tyrannosaurus, Mastodon, Triceratops, Sabertooth Tiger, and Pterodactyl. With all 5 together, these Power Rangers create the unstoppable Megazord, which stomps its way into Fortnite to crush bugs and put an end to the swarming threat that awaits the Fortnite island in Chapter 6 Season 4. Megazord helps put the shock and awesome in Shock 'N Awesome, but when does this skin release into Fortnite , and how can players get it?

When Does Megazord Come Out in Fortnite?

Fortnite x Power Rangers Megazord Release Date

While players can already get their hands on the Green Ranger and White Ranger in the Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 4 Battle Pass, players are going to have to wait just a little longer for the epic amalgam, Megazord. Megazord is part of the Chapter 6 Season 4 Battle Pass, meaning players will need to purchase the premium track for 1,000 V-Bucks or a month of the Fortnite Crew when this robot is released. Players can unlock Megazord starting September 16, 9 AM ET, up until November 1, 2025. Megazord's cosmetics are being kept a secret for now, so there's no telling what epic cosmetics it comes with. However, like previous secret skins in the Fortnite Battle Pass, players can expect to get Megazord after earning 12 Levels .

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: Roblox: Build A Boat For Treasure Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Codes For Build A Boat For Treasure
  • How to Redeem Codes in Build a Boat For Treasure
  • How to Play Build A Boat For Treasure
  • Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Build A Boat For Treasure
  • About the Build A Boat For Treasure Developers

Build A Boat For Treasure has gained popularity on Roblox because of its fantastic concept, where players first have to build a boat and then test it on an obstacle course. It can often be quite challenging for Roblox players to make a good boat in the early stages of the game, which is where the Build A Boat For Treasure codes listed below can come in handy.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several active codes are currently available, offering a mix of building materials and small amounts of in-game currency. These rewards can be useful whether you're starting out or just looking to stock up on extra supplies. Since the codes don’t last forever, it’s a good idea to redeem them while you can. More updates may bring fresh rewards, so be sure to check back regularly.

All Codes For Build A Boat For Treasure

Roblox players looking to get some extra gold, blocks, and other building materials for creating a beautiful boat can use the following active codes.

These codes will expire at random intervals, so be sure to redeem them as soon as they become available. Codes can only be redeemed once per account. Be sure to check back frequently, as codes can be released anytime during the month.

Working Build A Boat For Treasure Codes

  • hi - Redeem for 5 Gold
  • Squid Army - Redeem for 22x Ice and 22x Gold
  • =D - Redeem for 5 Gold
  • =P - Redeem for 5 Gold
  • chillthrill709 was here - Redeem for a Firework

Expired Build A Boat For Treasure Codes

  • Happy Valentine's day - Redeem for free blocks
  • Be a big f00t print - Redeem for free blocks
  • fuzzy friend? - Redeem for free blocks
  • Lurking Legend - Redeem for free blocks
  • GGGOOOAAALLL - Redeem for a Football
  • Free gifts - Redeem for a bunch of free gifts!
  • 1B - Redeem for free blocks!
  • voted code - Redeem for free blocks!
  • Lurking Code - Redeem for 10x Balloons, 5x Super Fireworks, 1x Portal Block!
  • 1M Likes - Redeem for free blocks!
  • Big F00t Print - Redeem for 10x Balloons, 5x Cake, 25x Neon Blocks!
  • The Sasquatch? - Redeem for 10x Balloons, 5x Circle Fireworks, 1x Portal Block!
  • Fireworks - Redeem for free blocks!
  • 2M members - Redeem for free Blocks!
  • Hatched code - Redeem for Cookie Wheels!
  • Happy Easter - Redeem for Balloons, Candy, & Cake!
  • TTTRRREEEAAASSSUUURRREEE - Redeem for a Green Treasure Chest!
  • BBBOOOAAATTTSSS!!! - Redeem for 1x Boat Motor, 1x Car Seat, 4x Wood Block, 1x Cake!
  • The Yeti - Redeem for 25x Green Presents, 25x Neon Blocks!
  • Cold Feet - Redeem for 25x Green Presents, 25x Neon Blocks!
  • 500M Visits - Redeem for 4x Portal, 5x Cake, 25x Balloons, 20x Star Blocks!
  • Veterans Day - Redeem for 10x Banners, 10x Star Blocks, 10x Balloons, 5x Circle Fireworks, 5x Cluster Fireworks, 5x Super Fireworks!

How to Redeem Codes in Build a Boat For Treasure

To redeem codes in Build A Boat For Treasure, players will simply need to follow the steps outlined below. If a code does not work, they should be sure to check that it was entered correctly. Assuming it was, it may mean that the code has recently expired or has already been redeemed.

  1. Launch Build A Boat For Treasure
  2. Press the treasure icon located to the right of the screen
  3. Once the pop-up menu opens up, select the gear icon at the top right
  4. Paste the code into the field
  5. Press Redeem to collect the rewards

How to Play Build A Boat For Treasure

Build A Boat For Treasure is a game in which players need to make their own boat and sail as far as possible. First, players need to go to a special area where they can build and then select the tool in the second inventory slot. A menu of resources will appear there, and at first, there will be a few of them.

After the players have built their boat and placed a chair, they should sit in it and press launch. After that, players have to swim as far as possible through the obstacles. They need to be very careful because the boat can be destroyed. After reaching a certain distance, players will receive rewards and can then repeat the process.

Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Build A Boat For Treasure

There are many games similar to Build A Boat For Treasure. Below, players will find a list of the top five games like Build A Boat For Treasure :

  • Anime Adventures
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragon Adventures
  • Boat Ride into a Better Life
  • Build a Boat or Die

About the Build A Boat For Treasure Developers

The team of developers, named Chillz Studios, who created Build A Boat For Treasure in 2016, has a lot of experience in creating games. Here is a list of other Roblox games from Chillz Studios that were popular before:

  • REVENGE OF THE SLIMES!!!
  • Mr. Cube The Boss Battle!
  • Marble Maker
  • Build and Burn

Summoners War is an epic adventure where you need to build the best set of characters and defeat many monsters that will stand in your way. You can choose unique tactics for each battle and get valuable rewards. If you like freebies, we have a list of codes for Summoners War that will speed up your progress.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new batch of Summoners War codes has arrived, offering a mix of scrolls, runes, energy, and more. These rewards can help you summon powerful creatures or boost your resources for upcoming battles. With multiple types of scrolls available, including Mythical and Fire, there's plenty to claim this time. Keep an eye out for future updates, as more codes may be released soon.

How to Redeem Codes in Summoners War

There are two ways to redeem codes in Summoners War . The first allows you to do it in the game itself. As you progress through the game, this feature will be unlocked for you eventually. The second way is to do this via the website. If you don't know how to redeem codes in Summoners War , follow the guide below:

First Method

  • Launch Summoners War .
  • Once in the game, go to the Event tab. It is on the right side of the screen under resources and currency.
  • Next, select the Event tab.
  • Among the offered options, select the Enter Your Promo Code link.
  • Redeem the code.
  • Enjoy.

Second Method

  • Open your browser.
  • Visit the Summoners War Coupon Exchange website.
  • Select your Game Server.
  • Next, enter your Hive ID.
  • Now, insert the code you want to use.
  • Launch Summoners War .
  • Enjoy your reward.

How to Get More Summoners War Codes

If you want to get more codes for Summoners War , we recommend that you subscribe to the official social networks of the developers. They often add new codes for holidays or events and post them on their pages. Here are some of them:

  • Instagram
  • Twitter (X)
  • Facebook

Summoners War is available on PC, Android, and iOS.

item.title: Pocket Pixel Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Pocket Pixel Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Pocket Pixel
  • How to Get More Pocket Pixel Codes

Pocket Pixel is a great pixelated Pokemon game where you can become a trainer and try to catch them all. While it is not an official Pokemon game, you will still have your own exciting story with obstacles, unexpected plot twists, and difficulties, so you need to be ready for it by having a strong team.

To make your task easier, you can redeem Pocket Pixel codes. Each of them offers generous rewards that will definitely come in handy during your adventures, so make sure to use them as soon as possible.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code has been added, giving you another chance to grab free rewards. With several active codes still available, you can collect valuable items like Gems, Tokens, Gold, and even a special Greninja. Each reward can help you in different ways depending on what you’re after. More bonuses might arrive soon, so don’t forget to check back regularly.

All Pocket Pixel Codes

Working Pocket Pixel Codes

  • oxaiajqh - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • HAPPY2025 - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • THANKGIVING - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • pocketpixel - Redeem this code to get 300 Gems and 10 Gashapon Tokens
  • pocketpixelfb - Redeem this code to get Greninja.
  • VIP666 - Redeem this code to get Gashapon Token, and Rare Candy.
  • VIP888 - Redeem this code to get two FP Tokens, and 10,000 Gold.

Expired Pocket Pixel Codes

  • 6jvgqh6u - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • qet0lgid - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • mkhuvrqo - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • m8pgjm1e - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • z3rap9up - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • fzpodpgy - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • eod2y4nn - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • TRICKORTREAT - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • rkuh9v0k - Redeem this code to get rewards.

Pocket Pixel codes offer a lot of freebies, including rare resources, so even if you're not a beginner, make sure you redeem them.

How to Redeem Codes for Pocket Pixel

Redeeming Pocket Pixel codes will take you a few seconds, and what's more, you can do it right after you launch the game, even ignoring the tutorial, which is not that common in mobile games. If you don't know or understand how the Pocket Pixel redemption system works, feel free to use the detailed guide below:

  • Launch Pocket Pixel .
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile menu. From here, go to the Options tab by clicking the corresponding button on the right side of the menu.
  • In the Options tab, pay attention to the bottom of the menu. Here you will see the Redeem Code button. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and two buttons, Cancel and Confirm. Now, enter manually or copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the orange Confirm button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Pocket Pixel Codes

If you want to find even more Pocket Pixel codes and get more freebies for this fun free mobile game, it will take you a little time. The fact is that you will need to carefully monitor the game's official social media for the presence of fresh codes. To save you some time, here are the links to the official social networks of Pocket Pixel :

  • Official Pocket Pixel Discord server.
  • Official Pocket Pixel Facebook page.

Pocket Pixel is only available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Project Smash Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Project Smash is a simple but very fun Roblox game that has deservedly become extremely popular in less than one year. When you first start this experience, it is not very clear what is going on, but the high quality of the game is immediately apparent, starting with the interface and ending with the combat system.

When you get into the game, all you have to do is choose one of several free classes and just start playing. Then, you get to a huge map where a bunch of players are fighting to the limit of their abilities so as not to lose all their health or fly off the map. There is a huge selection of characters in the game, each with 4 unique abilities, but most of them are expensive, so you have to defeat many players to get them. Therefore, it would be a good idea to redeem some Project Smash codes to get free currency.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are a few active codes available right now, each offering a decent amount of in-game cash. These can help you get a small head start or give you the extra funds you need to progress. Make sure to claim them while they’re still valid, as they might expire without warning. We keep this guide updated regularly, so don’t forget to check back for future rewards.

All Project Smash Codes

Working Project Smash Codes

  • Princess - Redeem for 1.5k Cash.
  • wellworks - Redeem for 1.5k Cash.
  • sketch - Redeem for 1.5k Cash.

Expired Project Smash Codes

  • anniversary

There are over 20 different characters in Project Smash , and this list is only growing with updates. This diversity adds a lot of interesting situations to the game and forces players to adapt and learn. However, new players will have to spend many hours in the game or buy Robux to try out all the characters.

How to Redeem Codes in Project Smash

In Project Smash , as in many Roblox games, redeeming codes is a fairly simple task even for beginners. However, this game has a well-designed interface that, although beautiful and convenient, may be unfamiliar to many. To help confused players, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Project Smash .

  • Open Roblox and launch Project Smash .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Click on the rectangular button with three dashes.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the dark purple field and click Redeem.

Remember that codes expire quickly, so in order not to miss out on rewards, redeem them as soon as you can.

How to Get More Project Smash Codes

We regularly update articles with Roblox codes, so we recommend that you bookmark this guide in your browser. It's also a good idea to follow the social media of the Project Smash developers:

  • Project Smash Roblox group
  • Project Smash Discord server
  • Project Smash X page
